I'm just surprised that a vaunted muckraker like yourself
translation.de: Ich bin nur überrascht, dass ein Skandalreporter wie Sie

translation.en: sees Hollywood's future as such a shiny penny.
Back to one.
Times are changing, Mr. Mankiewicz,
and I'm not just referring to this Depression.
All that bother.
And when all this is over,
picture-makers are gonna have to service this new entertainment.
translation.de: müssen Filmemacher diesen neuen Bedarf bedienen.

translation.en: I intend to make pictures with the help of real literary minds.
translation.de: Ich will Filme machen, die von Literaten geschrieben werden.

translation.en: I support that.
Instead, what do most studios give us? Gangster flicks, zanies.
translation.de: Was geben uns die Studios? Gangsterfilme, Klamauk.

translation.en: Too true.
Now, how many gangsters do Americans meet in a lifetime?
translation.de: Wie viele Gangster trifft man im Leben?

translation.en: How many families are like the Marx Brothers?
translation.de: Wie viele Familien sind wie die Marx Brothers?

translation.en: You mean, besides my own?
Very good. Have him seated next to me.
translation.de: Sehr gut. Setzen Sie ihn nachher neben mich.

translation.en: Miss Davies, Mr. Hearst would like Mr. Mankiewicz seated to his left at dinner.
translation.de: Miss Davies, Mr Hearst möchte Mr Mankiewicz beim Dinner neben sich.

translation.en: Pops likes you.
Why is it when Houseman edits,
everyone ends up speaking like a constipated Oxford don?
translation.de: klingt jeder wie ein verstopfter Oxford-Dozent.

translation.en: Yes, he is.
No, not at all. Please hold on.
It's Poor Sa-- I'm sorry. It's your wife.
translation.de: Es ist die arme Sa… Entschuldigung, Ihre Frau.

translation.en: -Schnutz. -I heard that.
Joe called four times in the last three days.
-He wants your number up there. -So give it to him.
translation.de: -Er will deine Nummer. -Dann gib sie ihm.

translation.en: Knock it off!
The boys are remodeling.
He seemed concerned about something. Is everything okay?
translation.de: Er schien besorgt. Ist alles in Ordnung?

translation.en: If I could swim, I'd be doing swimmingly.
And don't mind Joe. He's a worrisome old woman in disguise.
translation.de: Nimm Joe nicht so ernst. Er ist wie ein altes, ängstliches Weib.

translation.en: Well, he wants to offer you work.
Baby Joe, offering me?
translation.de: Der kleine Joe bietet mir Arbeit an?

translation.en: If he calls again, give him this number.
I've gotta run. Kiss the offspring.
translation.de: Ich muss los, küss die Sprösslinge.

translation.en: I say…
a letter from the gallant lieutenant.
Now, let's hope it makes more sense than the last.
translation.de: Macht hoffentlich mehr Sinn als der letzte.

translation.en: Fighters off the decks of aircraft carriers.
-Whoever had that idea? -It's not good?
Not good?
German U-boats are starting to hunt in packs,
and a Stuka dive-bomber can drop one down your stack from 500 feet.
translation.de: Eine Stuka trifft aus 150 Metern Höhe deinen Schlot.

translation.en: What's our valiant laddie have to say for the cause--
translation.de: Was sagt unser tapferer Bursche dazu?

translation.en: It's not from her husband.
translation.de: Der ist nicht von ihrem Mann.

translation.en: His ship's been sunk off Norway. Presumed lost at sea.
translation.de: Sein Schiff wurde vor Norwegen versenkt. Er ist verschollen.

translation.en: Always the smartest guy in the room.
translation.de: Warum muss ich immer so ein Schlaumeier sein?

translation.en: You're right.
Aircraft carriers are a shitty idea, but I don't appreciate the callousness.
translation.de: Flugzeugträger sind eine miese Idee, aber müssen Sie so herzlos sein?

translation.en: I expect more of you.
Presumed means they don't know, so I choose to believe he's alive until…
translation.de: Es ist nicht sicher, also lebt er für mich, bis…

translation.en: He's all right. Just sleeping.
translation.de: Es geht ihm gut, er schläft nur.

translation.en: Well… I shouldn't wonder.
There's enough Seconal in those bottles to bring down a bull elephant in heat.
translation.de: Das Seconal reicht, um einen brünstigen Elefanten zu betäuben.

translation.en: Young Orson doesn't believe in chance.
Houseman, you sly thing. You slipped me a Mickey.
translation.de: Houseman, ihr habt mir was in den Drink getan.

translation.en: So we did.
How you reached it so early in your rehabilitation, I cannot imagine.
translation.de: Wie du da rangekommen bist, ist mir ein Rätsel.

translation.en: How was it? Mother's milk?
On balance, better than nothing. I plan to use it as a nightcap.
translation.de: Alles in allem besser als nichts. Mein neuer Schlummertrunk.

translation.en: As you Yanks say, "He went out like a light."
translation.de: Ihm ging sofort das Licht aus.

translation.en: I couldn't have put it better myself, which may be why I write for the movies.
translation.de: Könnte von mir sein. Deshalb schreibe ich wohl Filme.

translation.en: Will you stop?
You write for the movies because you're super at it.
Excuse me, you two, I've masses of typing to do.
translation.de: Entschuldigen Sie mich. Ich habe viel zu tippen.

translation.en: Seventy-six pages.
By the time she translates your chicken scratch, it'll be less than 40.
translation.de: Wenn sie deine Klaue entziffert hat, sind es weniger als 40.

translation.en: At this rate, you'll never finish.
What I wanna know is what you think of it.
translation.de: Sag mir, was du davon hältst.

translation.en: The writing is first-rate, but you know that.
His lust for power, your evocation of his hunger for love from those who fear his worst side, but--
translation.de: Seine Gier nach Macht, nach Liebe derer, die ihn am meisten fürchten.

translation.en: The dreaded yet foreseeable "but."
You're asking a lot of a motion picture audience.
-It's a bit of a jumble. -Did you say "jumble" or "jungle"?
translation.de: -Es ist alles etwas wirre. -Wirre oder irre?

translation.en: A hodgepodge of talky episodes.
Fragments that leap around in time like Mexican jumping beans.
translation.de: Textfragmente, die in der Zeit herumspringen wie Bohnen.

translation.en: Welcome to my mind, old sock.
The story is so scattered, I'm afraid one will need a road map.
translation.de: Ohne Karte verirrt man sich in der verworrenen Story.

translation.en: -You mean it's a mess. -Would you consider simplifying?
translation.de: Es ist also Murks? Würdest du es straffen?

translation.en: As Pascal once said,
"If only I'd had more time, I would have written a shorter letter."
translation.de: "Ich hatte keine Zeit, einen kurzen Brief zu schreiben."

translation.en: All I am saying is no one can write like that.
But I can write like that, Houseman. I have.
translation.de: Aber ich kann es. Ich hab's getan.

translation.en: The narrative is one big circle, like a cinnamon roll,
translation.de: Die Erzählung ist ein Kreis, wie eine Zimtschnecke.

translation.en: not a straight line pointing to the nearest exit.
translation.de: Keine gerade Linie zum nächsten Ausgang.

translation.en: You cannot capture a man's entire life in two hours.
translation.de: Man fängt das Leben eines Mannes nicht in zwei Stunden ein.

translation.en: All you can hope is to leave the impression of one.
But nobody expects Shakespeare.
People aren't spending their hard-earned 25 cents to see Macbeth.
translation.de: Die Leute geben ihr Geld nicht für Macbeth aus.

translation.en: Maestro the Dog-Faced Boy did Macbeth.
Voodoo Macbeth. Don't be fooled. He's a showman.
translation.de: Voodoo Macbeth. Er ist ein Showman.

translation.en: Busker reveling in sleight of hand.
Save yourself the trouble, be done in 60 days.
He'll get this, and the audience will too. Stop worrying. Have a pickle.
translation.de: Alle kriegen, was sie wollen. Sei unbesorgt, nimm dir ein Gürkchen.

translation.en: No, thank you. I'm not hungry.
Haven't been since we got here.
Cheerio.
Write hard. Aim low.
Where were we, chief?
What are you gonna do?
-About what? -He's right.
You won't be done till Christmas.
-What? -You made a promise.
-I did what? -Sixty days is two weeks from now.
translation.de: -Was? -60 Tage sind in zwei Wochen um.

translation.en: Where were we?
Bernstein's speech, the young woman on the ferryboat.
translation.de: Bernsteins Rede, die junge Frau auf der Fähre.

translation.en: Read it back, please.
"A white dress she had on, and she was carrying a white parasol,
translation.de: "Sie trug ein weißes Kleid und hatte einen weißen Sonnenschirm.

translation.en: and I only saw her for one second, and she didn't see me at all."
translation.de: Ich sah sie nur für einen Augenblick, sie mich gar nicht.

translation.en: "But I'll bet a month hasn't gone by since that I haven't thought of that girl."
translation.de: Doch seitdem habe ich jeden Monat an sie gedacht."

translation.en: A snapshot from the Mankiewicz family album?
You might say that.
It really is a gorgeous--
Spot to get stuck?
-Is Bernstein meant to be Louis Mayer? -If form follows function.
translation.de: Ist Bernstein Mayer? Form folgt Funktion.

translation.en: Mayer is the same pathetic sort of lapdog to our Charles Foster?
translation.de: Ist Mayer derselbe Stieffellecker für unseren Charles Foster?

translation.en: Bernstein is a far nicer character.
You don't much like Mayer.
If I ever go to the electric chair, I'd like him to be sitting in my lap.
translation.de: Säße ich auf dem elektrischen Stuhl, hätte ich ihn gern auf dem Schoß.

translation.en: Seven-fifty a week? That's half what you make, Herman.
translation.de: 750 pro Woche? Du verdienst das Doppelte.

translation.en: -You're a junior writer, Joe. -So?
So, you're only half the wit your big brother is.
translation.de: Und hast nur halb so viel Grips wie ich.

translation.en: -How many half-wits make that? -Herm, how do I look?
translation.de: -Wie viele Gripshälften macht das? -Wie sehe ich aus?

translation.en: -You look like you. Fine. -What should I be expecting?
translation.de: Wie du selbst. Prima. Was erwartet mich?

translation.en: You're related to me. He already thinks you're a genius.
translation.de: Als mein Bruder bist du ein Genie für ihn.

translation.en: Enough.
The job will be yours if you can do two things.
translation.de: Du hast den Job, wenn du zwei Dinge kannst.

translation.en: One, don't roll your eyes. Two, try not to fall asleep.
translation.de: Verdreh nicht die Augen und versuch nicht einzuschlafen.

translation.en: This isn't Gower Gulch. You want I should make a picture about a prostitute?
translation.de: Wir sind nicht bei Columbia Pictures. Ein Film über Prostituierte?

translation.en: What's wrong with that? My mother was nothing but a whore.
translation.de: Na und? Meine Mutter war eine Hure.

translation.en: You would talk about your own mother that way?
translation.de: So reden Sie über Ihre Mutter?

translation.en: The woman who gave you life?
You ungrateful bastard! I ought to cut your balls off!
translation.de: Undankbares Schwein! Ich schneid Ihnen die Eier ab!

translation.en: Do it, you fucking junk dealer! I'll still be the better man!
translation.de: Nur zu, Sie Schrotthändler! Ich wäre immer noch der bessere Mann!

translation.en: L.B., this is my brother, Joe.
translation.de: L.B., das ist mein Bruder Joe.

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Joseph. I'm Louis Mayer.
I can't tell you what this means to him, Louis.
-They're all there, Mr. Mayer. -On my way. Joe, walk with me.
translation.de: -Es sind alle da, Mr Mayer. -Bin unterwegs. Joe, kommen Sie.

translation.en: My boy, there are three work rules at this studio.
Rule number one, ars gratia artis-- art for art's sake.
translation.de: Nummer eins: Ars gratia artis. Die Kunst um der Kunst willen.

translation.en: How you doing?
One million dollars a year we spend on stories we never even film.
translation.de: Eine Million pro Jahr für Storys, die nie gefilmt werden.

translation.en: Why not? I'll tell you. They don't make me cry.
translation.de: Warum? Weil sie mich nicht zum Weinen bringen.

translation.en: What makes me cry? Emotion.
translation.de: Was bringt mich zum Weinen? Emotionen.

translation.en: Where do I feel emotion?
Here, here, and here.
Rule number two.
You may have heard MGM has more stars than the heavens.
translation.de: MGM soll mehr Sterne als der Himmel haben.

translation.en: Do not believe this.
Hiya. We have only one star. That is Leo the Lion.
translation.de: Wir haben nur einen Star: Leo, den Löwen.

translation.en: Never forget that.
Many stars have, and now they twinkle elsewhere.
Rule number three…
People think MGM stands for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer.
translation.de: Die Leute glauben, MGM stehe für "Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer".

translation.en: It does not.
It stands for Mayer's gantze mishpokhe, Mayer's whole family.
translation.de: Es steht für "Mayers ganze Mischpoke", Mayers ganze Familie.

translation.en: Never forget that.
You got a problem, come to Papa.
translation.de: Bei Problemen kommen Sie zu Papa.

translation.en: This is a business where the buyer gets nothing for his money but a memory.
translation.de: Bei uns erwirbt man für sein Geld nur eine Erinnerung.

translation.en: What he bought still belongs to the man who sold it.
That's the real magic of the movies, and don't let anybody tell you different.
translation.de: Das ist die wahre Magie des Films und nichts anderes.

translation.en: I find myself in a horrendous position, and I come to all of you on bended knee.
translation.de: Ich befinde mich in einer entsetzlichen Lage und komme auf Knien zu Ihnen.

translation.en: We are suffering, as all Americans are, from our country's terrible economic woes.
translation.de: Wie alle Amerikaner leiden wir unter den schlimmen Wirtschaftsproblemen.

translation.en: Good people, everyday people, can't afford to go to the movies.
translation.de: Der Durchschnittsbürger kann sich kein Kino leisten.

translation.en: So even our preeminent dream factory…
translation.de: So ist selbst unsere herausragende Traumfabrik

translation.en: is in grave financial difficulty.
I am asking everyone in the MGM family to take a painful step.
translation.de: Ich bitte jeden der MGM-Familie um einen schmerzhaften Schritt,

translation.en: I am asking to roll back salaries.
translation.de: und zwar um einen teilweisen Lohnverzicht.

translation.en: I don't want to,
but for this hallowed place to continue to exist, I am forced to.
translation.de: aber nur so können diese heiligen Hallen überleben.

translation.en: I won't break up this family over something like money.
translation.de: Diese Familie darf nicht des schnöden Geldes wegen zerbrechen.

translation.en: -How long are you asking for? -Shouldn't be long.
How much are you asking for?
-Half. -Half?
-Could be less. -Is everybody going to be pitching in?
Are you, Mr. Mayer?
Real families root for each other in the good times,
translation.de: In guten Zeiten stützen sich Familien,

translation.en: take care of each other in tough ones.
We're with you, L.B.
You may be, Mr. Barrymore,
but a 50% pay cut for grips and electricians--
Eight weeks, my friends, eight short weeks.
As soon as FDR reopens the banks, you'll get back every penny.
translation.de: Wenn die Banken wieder öffnen, kriegt ihr jeden Penny zurück.

translation.en: On that, you have the sacred word of L.B. Mayer.
translation.de: Darauf habt ihr das heilige Ehrenwort von L.B. Mayer.

translation.en: Well, I vote yes.
-I do as well. -Me too.
-How'd I do, Ben? -It was great, Mr. Mayer.
Not even the most disgraceful thing I've ever seen.
translation.de: Ich habe sogar schon Plumperes gesehen.

translation.en: Good.
Maybe a little bit left?
Here?
-Yeah. -I've got to get typewriter ribbon.
-Here are this morning's pages. -It's all dreck!
Don't flagellate. At least you're writing.
None of it sings. None of it. Not a note.
translation.de: Da singt nichts, nicht eine Note.

translation.en: You're not writing opera.
But I am writing an opera.
It's for you.
-Yeah? -Herman, it's Joe.
Hey, kid. What's up?
-Checking in. How are you getting around? -Gingerly.
-Any rest? -Haven't seen a sunrise yet.
translation.de: -Kriegst du Ruhe? -Sehe die Sonne nie aufgehen.

translation.en: You've never seen a sunrise.
-Sara said you wanted this number. -Just to hear your voice.
translation.de: -Du wolltest meine Nummer? -Um deine Stimme zu hören.

translation.en: She said you had some work you wanted to talk about.
translation.de: Sara sagte, du wolltest über einen Auftrag reden.

translation.en: I was thinking about that old play,
translation.de: Ja, mir fiel dein altes Stück ein, Der Wilde von Borneo.

translation.en: The Wild Man of Borneo, that you wrote in the Ice Age.
translation.de: Ja, mir fiel dein altes Stück ein, Der Wilde von Borneo. Aus der Eiszeit.

translation.en: One never remembers one's disasters. It's considered gauche.
translation.de: Man vergisst seine Flops, das gehört sich so.

translation.en: A play is never a disaster till the movies say it is.
translation.de: Was ein Flop ist, entscheidet das Kino.

translation.en: I brought it to my people at the studio.
We want W.C. Fields, and we want you to adapt.
translation.de: Wir wollen W.C. Fields, mit deiner Adaptation.

translation.en: I'm kind of on something right now.
I can get you paid for the play and the adaptation.
translation.de: Sie zahlen für das Stück und die Adaptation.

translation.en: Sounds great, but I'll have to think about it.
translation.de: Klingt gut, aber ich muss darüber nachdenken.

translation.en: These things have their moment.
So, this isn't an offer. It's a subtle ultimatum.
translation.de: Das ist kein Angebot, sondern ein Ultimatum.

translation.en: Nobody could ever tell you what to do.
translation.de: Niemand kann dir je was vorschreiben.

translation.en: Did Sara put you up to this?
Not at all, but I know how things are. I can tell by her voice.
translation.de: Nein, aber ich höre an ihrer Stimme, wie es steht.

translation.en: -And how bad is that, baby brother? -How bad?
I went to a party last night where Scott Fitzgerald referred to you as a ruined man.
translation.de: Auf der Party, wo ich gestern war, nannte Scott Fitzgerald dich bankrott.

translation.en: -That's how bad things can get. -That's good. I may use that.
translation.de: -Schlimmer geht es nicht. -Das ist gut, könnte ich verwenden.

translation.en: Hermie--
Please, stop, Joey. Just tell me what's on your mind.
translation.de: Bitte, sag mir einfach, was dich beschäftigt.

translation.en: I hear you're hunting dangerous game.
Word on the street is radio's golden boy wants to go toe-to-toe with Willie Hearst,
translation.de: Man sagt, der Radio-Goldjunge fordert Willie Hearst heraus,

translation.en: and you're helping in the kitchen.
translation.de: und du hilfst in der Küche.

translation.en: -And? -"And?"
Herman, "And?"
How stupid of me.
I thought I was rejecting a humiliating handout,
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich schlage ein Almosen aus,

translation.en: when all the time, I was nixing a respectable bribe.
translation.de: dabei war es eine anständige Bestechung.

translation.en: And I'm sorry I ever cared.
translation.de: Ich war besorgt, tut mir leid.

translation.en: Come on.
Marion and I are so pleased you could all come stay for the weekend.
translation.de: Marion und ich freuen uns, Sie hier zu haben.

translation.en: I hope the train ride wasn't too arduous.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, die Zugfahrt war erträglich.

translation.en: And tonight, we're celebrating our great friend's birthday
translation.de: Wir feiern heute Abend den Geburtstag eines großen Freundes

translation.en: in our little hillside home.
translation.de: in unserem Häuschen in den Hügeln.

translation.en: Charlie.
Louis, you should be joyous. You don't look a day over 48.
translation.de: Louis, Sie können froh sein. Sie sehen höchstens wie 48 aus.

translation.en: I feel 35.
Mr. Hearst, Marion, all of you,
my heart is full to bursting.
I can't express in words…
Please don't try.
W.R., nothing is more precious to me than your friendship and sage advice.
translation.de: W.R… Nichts ist mir teurer als Ihre Freundschaft und Ihr guter Rat.

translation.en: I am blessed to call you my friend.
translation.de: Ich habe Glück, Sie als Freund zu haben.

translation.en: God bless William Randolph Hearst.
God bless us, every one.
-Hear, hear. -A very happy birthday, Louis.
Our country should be flattered you picked its birth date as your own.
translation.de: Sie haben Ihren Geburtstag auf den unseres Landes gelegt.

translation.en: The rest of us have to be satisfied with the one we happened to be born on.
translation.de: Für den Rest von uns entscheidet das der Zufall.

translation.en: Here's to your rich Canadian imagination.
To rich Canadian imagination!
Here's to banks reopening. -And to freedom. -Freedom!
translation.de: -Auf die Wiedereröffnung der Banken! -Und auf die Freiheit!

translation.en: I believe you've met our distinguished guest, Mr. Rexford Tugwell.
translation.de: Sie kennen unseren Ehrengast, Mr Rexford Tugwell.

translation.en: Now, Rex is special assistant to President Roosevelt.
And we're all interested in what you might share with us.
translation.de: Wir sind alle gespannt auf Ihre Einblicke.

translation.en: We all wanna welcome the Thalbergs
back from Irving's long convalescence in Europe.
translation.de: die nach Irvings Genesung aus Europa zurück sind.

translation.en: -Thank you, W.R. -Good to see you, Irving.
-Thank you, Mr. Hearst. -Norma.
Anybody seen anything good lately?
I just saw 42nd Street. It blew my wig!
translation.de: Ich hab Die 42. Straße gesehen. Mir blieb die Spucke weg!

translation.en: You can take the girl outta Bed-Stuy.
-When was that? -Over the weekend.
translation.de: Wann war das? Am Wochenende, als du in D.C. warst. Ich fuhr nach Santa Barbara.

translation.en: You were in D.C. I went to the pictures in Santa Barbara.
translation.de: Am Wochenende, als du in D.C. warst. Ich fuhr nach Santa Barbara.

translation.en: We have a fine screening room here.
Warner's picture? Why waste money on that?
translation.de: Warum für einen Warner-Film Geld verschwenden?

translation.en: -Next time, I'll go with you. -Of course.
I am bonkers about Movietone News. I love Lowell Thomas's voice.
translation.de: Ich liebe die Wochenschau und Lowell Thomas' Stimme.

translation.en: Is he single?
I sat across from him at the Brown Derby once.
translation.de: Im Brown Derby saß ich ihm mal gegenüber.

translation.en: -He bought me a drink. -He didn't!
Not technically.
But I made sure to run into him in the parking lot after.
translation.de: Aber ich fing ihn am Parkplatz ab.

translation.en: -I asked him, "Do you need a lift?" -You didn't! What did he say?
translation.de: -Ich fragte: "Soll ich Sie mitnehmen?" -Echt? Und er?

translation.en: -I'll never tell. -There's a point to this, dear?
Well, yes, they showed that Hitler giving a speech, kissing babies.
translation.de: Sie haben gezeigt, wie dieser Hitler eine Rede hält und Babys küsst.

translation.en: He is creepers!
Lederhosen and suspenders. Terrifying.
No, it's the mustache that's the horror.
translation.de: Nein, das Schlimmste ist der Schnurrbart.

translation.en: Don't be alarmed, Marion. He won't be around for long.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Er hält sich nicht.

translation.en: The Germans are a thoughtful, considerate people.
translation.de: Die Deutschen sind vernünftig und besonnen.

translation.en: Enough about Nazis.
Irving, tell us about your travels. Where were you?
translation.de: Irving, erzählen Sie von Ihren Reisen. Wo waren Sie?

translation.en: Berlin, in fact.
But it was interesting.
Thugs in brown shirts goose-stepping past our hotel all night,
translation.de: Nachts marschierten Braunhemden am Hotel vorbei

translation.en: screaming anti-Semitic slogans. I was terrified.
translation.de: und brüllten antisemitische Parolen, es war grausig.

translation.en: This Hitler sounds like a drip.
translation.de: Hitler scheint ein Idiot zu sein.

translation.en: Shouldn't the United States do something, Mr. Tugwell?
We are weighing all options.
Can't last. Who takes a lunatic like that seriously?
The last time I looked, 40 million Germans.
Mank! You're always so wonderfully contrary.
translation.de: Mank, Sie sind immer so schön widerborstig.

translation.en: "Chase & Sanborn's der coffee. Can 40 million Nazis all be wrong?"
I just read they've opened their first concentration camps
and started burning books.
-What's next? Movies? -Enough.
-Is that true, Irving? -Yes, L.B.
You don't turn your back on a market as big as Germany.
Please. It's upsetting enough Marion had to endure the man in newsreel.
translation.de: Bitte. Schlimm genug, dass Marion ihn im Kino sehen musste.

translation.en: What's a concentration camp?
It was fascinating. Those people adore him.
translation.de: Die Menschen dort beten ihn an.

translation.en: -I'm probably talking nonsense. -You're the first tonight that isn't.
translation.de: -Ich rede Unsinn. -Sie sind die Erste hier, die's nicht tut.

translation.en: Speaking of socialists, how about Sinclair's book?
translation.de: Was halten Sie von Upton Sinclairs neuem Buch?

translation.en: He wants to turn private enterprise over to the state.
translation.de: Er will alle privaten Unternehmen verstaatlichen.

translation.en: There's one we won't be optioning. It's selling like crazy.
translation.de: -Auf die Filmrechte verzichten wir. -Es verkauft sich rasend.

translation.en: Walter Winchell says Sinclair may run for governor.
That rat Bolshevik belongs right up there with Hitler
translation.de: Dieser Bolschewik ist mit Hitler gleichzusetzen,

translation.en: on the list of people not to be taken seriously.

-But what did Marion do to deserve this? -It's not her!
translation.de: aber hat Marion das verdient? Es ist nicht sie!

translation.en: You know better than anyone, not all characters are headliners. Some are secondary.
translation.de: Es gibt nicht nur Hauptrollen, es gibt auch Nebenrollen.

translation.en: Well, that's why I'm here. On behalf of the secondary characters.
translation.de: Im Namen der Nebenrollen bin ich auch hier.

translation.en: I thought you'd wanna know there's a rumor
you're out to get Hearst because they dropped you from L.B.'s payroll,
translation.de: du rächst dich an Hearst, weil L.B. dich rausschmiss

translation.en: that they didn't want you around.
Don't believe everything you hear at Schwab's.
translation.de: Glaub nicht alles, was du hörst.

translation.en: Hey, you made yourself court jester.
translation.de: Du hast dich selbst zu seinem Hofnarr gemacht.

translation.en: Someone had to say it.
People are speculating Rosebud is W.R.'s pet name for Marion's genitalia.
translation.de: Man munkelt, "Rosebud" sei sein Name für Marions Vagina.

translation.en: -I know you'd never stoop to that. -Only because I hadn't heard.
translation.de: So weit würdest du nie gehen. Ich wusste es nur nicht.

translation.en: Charlie tells me you're up for Thalberg's old job.
translation.de: Charlie sagt, du kriegst Thalbergs Job.

translation.en: -Not anymore. -Did I bollix that?
Don't flatter yourself, Herman. I did it all alone.
translation.de: Bild dir nichts ein, das war ich allein.

translation.en: Now, there's a first.
I exposed myself, not entirely metaphorically, in court.
translation.de: Ich habe mich bei Hofe entblößt.

translation.en: Do tell.
Somebody was bitching about Mervyn LeRoy running over budget on Wizard of Oz.
translation.de: Es ging um LeRoys Budget beim Zauberer von Oz.

translation.en: -Goddamn movie again. -I said, "Le Roy s'amuse."
I was then forced to spend 20 minutes
having to explain that "Le Roy" is "le roi" in French and means "the king."
translation.de: dass "Le Roy" auf Französisch "Le Roi" ist und "König" heißt.

translation.en: Or to be specific, François I
and his royal habit of s'amus-ing himself by diddling all the ladies of his court.
translation.de: der sich königlich amüsierte, indem er die Hofdamen bestieg.

translation.en: You know, Pop was right. You should've been a professor.
translation.de: Pop hatte recht. Wärst du mal Professor geworden.

translation.en: Nobody knew what the fuck I was talking about.
They say I was passed over because I'm not a team player.
translation.de: Sie sagen, ich wäre nicht teamfähig.

translation.en: But I know better.
It was the goddamn French pun that did me in.
I'm washed up, Joe.
Have been for years.
It's the best thing you've ever written.
A rare bird, that.
A Mankiewicz.
-You can't do it that way. -Do what?
Kill yourself. I've tried. It takes years.
I was tired of doing inserts and pick-up shots.
translation.de: Ich hatte Inserts und Nachdrehs so satt.

translation.en: You're not the first person to trade integrity for a chance in the big chair.
translation.de: Schon viele opferten ihre Integrität der Karriere.

translation.en: Thalberg said this was your idea.
translation.de: Thalberg sagt, es war Ihre Idee.

translation.en: Sometimes my asides are too clever by half.
Go home to Fay.
-Eve. -Eve. Sorry.
Look at what we did. We can't un-ring this bell.
translation.de: Schauen Sie, was wir angerichtet haben.

translation.en: We have to be vigilant. In regards to?
People sitting in the dark,
willingly checking their disbelief at the door.
translation.de: die ihre Skepsis an der Tür abgeben.

translation.en: We have a huge responsibility.
I got it.
Got what?
Parkinson's.
No, Shelly.
I'm so sorry.
First, you get the tremors,
and your muscles begin to fail.
Pretty soon, you can't get out of a chair.
Then smiling, speaking, everything goes.
translation.de: Dann das Lächeln, die Sprache, du verlierst alles.

translation.en: And it keeps going till…
You could always produce.
Give me the gun, Shelly.
Take 'em, Mank.
Go on home. I'll be fine.
Is he with you?
He wouldn't come.
Tell me you got the gun.
Oh, my God!
-What? -He had a whole box.
You have another visitor.
What?
Drink it fast.
In this heat, it'll flash to sugar.
translation.de: Bei der Hitze wird er zu Zucker.

translation.en: Why the wine and dine, Marion?
Good cop, bad cop?
-How do you mean, Mank? -First Joe, now you.
Can't you just tell me what's on your mind?
Well, I read the script.
Who hasn't?
It's very grand, Mank, in its own way, and very much you.
translation.de: Es ist auf seine Art großartig, so wie Sie.

translation.en: I would've loved to play me ten years ago.
It was never meant to be you.
For myself, I don't care, Mank. Really, I don't.
translation.de: Es geht mir nicht um mich, Mank.

translation.en: But I beg you, don't kick Pops when he's down.
translation.de: Aber treten Sie Pops nicht, wenn er am Boden ist.

translation.en: Willie, down?
I haven't told a soul this,
but I had to loan him a million dollars just to save San Simeon.
translation.de: ich musste ihm eine Million für San Simeon leihen.

translation.en: You hocked your jewels?
Of course not, just some real estate. He bought me most of it anyway.
translation.de: Natürlich nicht, nur ein paar Immobilien.

translation.en: Willie sent you.
Didn't have to.
That surprises you?
You're the most observant man I know.
-Then you deserve better. -That's very sweet.
I always wanted better.
Mama Rose, too.
She made sure her daughters learned to sing and dance.
translation.de: Ihre Töchter lernten Singen und Tanzen.

translation.en: We were never gonna end up in Brooklyn.
I was only 16 when I was cast in Stop! Look! Listen!
translation.de: Mit 16 wurde ich für Stop, Look and Listen besetzt.

translation.en: That's some title.
Willie came to the show. Same seat, every night.
And all the other girls said to watch out. He was too old for me and too interested.
translation.de: Die Mädchen warnten mich, er sei zu alt, zu interessiert.

translation.en: Come now, he wasn't your only admirer.
translation.de: Er war nicht Ihr einziger Bewunderer.

translation.en: The thing you got so right in your script…
was how lonely he'd been as a boy.
translation.de: wie einsam er als Junge war.

translation.en: When my own mother heard he was one of the richest men in America,
translation.de: Als Mutter hörte, wie reich er sei,

translation.en: she said, "Kick a little higher."
He has always been so kind to me.
translation.de: Er war immer so gütig zu mir.

translation.en: I love the old guy, Mank.
Maybe I didn't always, back when he was my social security.
translation.de: Vielleicht nicht, als er noch meine Versicherung war.

translation.en: But now, there are things about us together…
that no one could possibly…
Am I persuading you at all?
I hope, if this gets made,
translation.de: Ich hoffe, falls es gedreht wird,

translation.en: you'll forgive me.
And I hope, if it doesn't,
you'll forgive me.
He was a modest man.
His name never appeared on the marquee
with the great stars, great producers, great directors who worked alongside him.
translation.de: mit den Stars, Produzenten und Regisseuren.

translation.en: But he loved moving pictures more than he loved anything.
translation.de: Aber er liebte den Film über alles.

translation.en: And he left his impeccable taste, his incredible attention to detail
translation.de: Sein sicherer Geschmack, sein Auge fürs Detail

translation.en: on every frame he touched.
translation.de: schlugen sich in jedem Bild nieder.

translation.en: It is not for us to say why he was taken from us so unexpectedly.
translation.de: Wir wissen nicht, warum er uns so unerwartet genommen wurde.

translation.en: Behind, he leaves his memory.
The memory of a great man, a talented man, a man of unblemished integrity.
translation.de: Das Andenken an einen großen, talentierten, anständigen Mann.

translation.en: I haven't seen you since, what was it, Jack Gilbert's funeral?
translation.de: Zuletzt sah ich Sie auf Jack Gilberts Trauerfeier.

translation.en: Well, I haven't seen you since Shelly Metcalf's.
Has it been that long?
-How you been, Mank? -Between pictures.
-I thought you were still at MGM. -I am.
translation.de: Dachte, Sie wären noch bei MGM. Bin ich.

translation.en: Well, look. Come see me at International. Let's work something out.
I did come to see you.
You gave me the same invitation after Shelly's funeral.
I couldn't get past your secretary's secretary.
translation.de: Kam nicht am ersten Vorzimmer vorbei.

translation.en: Is that right?
Good to see you, Mank.
-Hello. -Mank?
One moment, please.
It's Orson.
It's Orson.
I've just finished your first draft, and I must say,
I'm pleased and impressed.
-Are you? Good news. -It'll need work, of course.
But there are no problems that can't be solved together.
translation.de: Aber das lässt sich alles lösen.

translation.en: Well, I'm delighted to hear it.
Houseman's bringing my notes. Think about 'em.
Meantime, I'll run everything through my typewriter.
Everything will thank you.
You're in touch with your Hollywood crowd?
Good old Houseman.
Perhaps you've heard. None of the theater chains will touch us.
translation.de: Kein Kino traut sich an uns ran.

translation.en: It looks like RKO will have to sue for restraint of trade.
They'll countersue, of course.
If you own any part of that lovely home of yours,
it might be a good idea to put it in Poor Sara's name.
-You still there, Mank? -Yes. Where else would I be?
translation.de: -Sind Sie noch da? -Wo sollte ich sonst sein?

translation.en: I've saved the best for last.
Guess who phoned with an offer to buy out RKO's investment
and shelve the picture permanently.
translation.de: den Film ad acta zu legen?

translation.en: -Not Hearst? -Mank, I'm surprised.
Would Othello snoop on Desdemona when he has Iago?
Mayer. What did RKO say?
No dice, but they're on their uppers. Whether they--
translation.de: Keine Chance, aber ob sie durchhalten…

translation.en: -You'd better drive up. -I plan to, as soon as I'm done--
Today, if possible.
Dear Jove, did I say something I shouldn't have?
I hope you haven't lost your nerve.
Nerve's about all I've got left.
translation.de: Nerven sind alles, was ich hab.

translation.en: What a year you've had, Louis. How have you weathered it?
translation.de: Welch schweres Jahr für Sie, Louis.

translation.en: Despite everything, the MGM ship, I'm happy to say, is full steam ahead.
translation.de: Trotz allem fährt das MGM-Schiff mit voller Kraft voraus.

translation.en: We're on track with this recent slate for our most successful year ever.
translation.de: Wenn es so weitergeht, wird das unser erfolgreichstes Jahr.

translation.en: Well, that's great news.
Would you like to go and lay down?
I think I'd rather stay upright.
-Perhaps we can find you a costume. -Well, why would I need a cost--
translation.de: -Wir finden ein Kostüm für Sie. -Wozu das denn?

translation.en: Hello, everyone. Better late than never.
translation.de: Hallo, Leute. Besser spät als nie.

translation.en: Mank! Where's Sara?
Caring for clan Mankiewicz.
-And what train did you take? -Glendale. I missed my stop.
Got a taxi from Morro Bay.
translation.de: Nahm ein Taxi in Morro Bay.

translation.en: I'm confused. I thought the invitation called for circus attire,
not flea circus.
I was cornered by a man who sold vacuum cleaners.
A show of hands, who knows what a vacuum cleaner is?
translation.de: Hände hoch, wer weiß, was ein Staubsauger ist?

translation.en: Martin, would you set a place for Mr. Mankiewicz,
somewhere where he might get some air?
Would you follow me this way, sir?
And offer him some coffee.
Yeah. Mr. Monkeywitz could use some coffee.
And how's Marie Antoinette coming together?
Previews have been a struggle for general audiences.
translation.de: Bei den Vorschauen fiel er durch.

translation.en: We made some trims, but I should've known.
Versailles, all those costumes and wigs.
You can't tell those stories without overhauling them for a modern audience.
How's the performance of your leading lady?
The picture depends upon her.
Norma put her heart and soul into it.
translation.de: Norma war mit Herz und Seele dabei,

translation.en: I should've insisted she take some time.
-It's a lot to deal with a loss like that. -Marion would've made it her own.
translation.de: Der Verlust war zu frisch. Marion hätte inkarniert.

translation.en: Marion would have been perfection.
-Marion Antoinette. -But it was Irving's picture.
Marionette.
I'm not interested in educating our customers.
translation.de: Mir geht es nicht um Bildung.

translation.en: You want to send a message? Call Western Union.
Literary pictures.
"Let them get cake."
Who needs to see that?
Joanna, come along now. I'll show you those horses we talked about.
translation.de: Joanna, komm. Ich zeige dir die Pferde.

translation.en: She's very pretty.
Also, very bright, bullheaded, and British.
translation.de: Und sehr klug, dickköpfig und britisch.

translation.en: Are you here to try your luck, too, Schnutz?
-At what? -Changing my mind.
I never had much success with that, Herman.
You'll do what you need to.
translation.de: Du wirst tun, was du musst.

translation.en: Charlie's been here, Joe's been, Marion's been.
translation.de: Charlie war hier, Joe und Marion.

translation.en: For one reason or another, all of them want me to walk away.
You care to hear what I've decided?
Not really.
After 20 years of connubial bliss,
blind loyalty can get a little suffocating.
Okay. Here goes.
God knows I've rehearsed it enough.
I've raised your kids kosher and all but by myself.
translation.de: Ich zog deine Kinder koscher groß, allein.

translation.en: I've put up with your suicidal drinking,
your compulsive gambling, your silly platonic affairs.
You owe me, Herman.
Joe says he can't promise,
but he thinks if you make nice with Mayer, you can have your old job back.
Is that what you want me to say? I know what your answer'll be,
translation.de: Willst du das hören? Ich kenne deine Antwort,

translation.en: so don't ask me to give you Poor Sara's seal of approval.
translation.de: also verlange nicht den Segen der armen Sara.

translation.en: Why do you put up with me, Schnutz?
My movie-star looks or my diplomat's charm?
translation.de: Ist es mein Aussehen oder mein Charme?

translation.en: I suppose because being married to you, Herman, I'm never bored.
translation.de: Mit dir verheiratet zu sein ist nie langweilig.

translation.en: Exhausted, yes. Exasperated, usually.
But having devoted so much,
I have to stick around to see how it turns out.
translation.de: ich will sehen, wie es endet.

translation.en: And whatever you decide…
please be mindful of those who care about you most.
translation.de: denk an die, die dich am meisten lieben.

translation.en: I'm going riding.
Haven't seen a horse's face in years.
And one last thing, Herman.
I don't want nobody calling me Poor Sara no more.
I've got a great idea for a picture, Louis.
translation.de: Ich hab eine Idee für einen Film, Louis.

translation.en: A picture I just know you're gonna love.
translation.de: Ich weiß einfach, dass sie ihn lieben werden.

translation.en: It's a modern-day version of Quixote.
Now, I know none of you read, but you know what it's about.
translation.de: Keiner von Ihnen liest, aber sie kennen die Story.

translation.en: A deluded old nobleman who tilts at windmills.
translation.de: Ein verwirrter Edelmann kämpft gegen Windmühlen.

translation.en: So how might we update this story?
-Do you want me to get someone? -No.
How about we make our Quixote… a newspaperman?
translation.de: Machen wir doch aus unserm Quijote einen Zeitungsmann.

translation.en: Who else could make a living tilting at windmills?
translation.de: Wer sonst verdient Geld bei diesem Kampf?

translation.en: But that's not enough.
No, he wants more than readership.
He wants more than adulation. He wants love.
translation.de: Er will mehr als Bewunderung. Er will Liebe.

translation.en: So, he runs for public office, and because he's notably rich, he wins.
translation.de: Er kandidiert für ein Amt, und da er reich ist, gewinnt er.

translation.en: No, wait a minute.
Notably rich and powerful can't win over an audience
translation.de: Reich und mächtig zu sein gewinnt kein Publikum.

translation.en: unless notably rich and powerful sees the error of his ways in the final reel.
translation.de: Es sei denn, er erkennt im letzten Akt seine Fehler.

translation.en: Notably rich and powerful
and making no goddamn excuses for it is only admirable in real life.
translation.de: ohne sich dafür zu entschuldigen, feiert man nur im echten Leben.

translation.en: Isn't that right, Louis?
So what do we do?
Anybody?
We give him ideals.
Ideals that any dirt-poor,
depression-weary audience can identify with.
Our Quixote is against crooked trusts.
He's for the eight-hour workday, fair income tax, better schools.
translation.de: für den Achtstundentag, faire Steuern, Bildung.

translation.en: Why, he's even for government ownership of railroads.
You know what we call those people?
-Communists? -Anarchists?
No, our Quixote, he's a two-fisted muckraker.
translation.de: Nein, er teilt als Skandalreporter kräftig aus.

translation.en: In fact, someone predicts that he will one day
translation.de: Manche prophezeien, dass er eines Tages

translation.en: win the presidency and bring about, get this…
a socialist revolution.
-What a bunch of bullshit! -Is it?
Tell him, Willie.
Tell him.
Upton Sinclair used exactly those words
translation.de: Upton Sinclair beschrieb mit genau diesen Worten

translation.en: to describe a young William Randolph Hearst.
-You miserable bastard! -How do you do?
Our Quixote, he hungers, he thirsts,
he lusts for the voters to love him.
Love him enough to make him president. But they won't, and they don't.
translation.de: Ihn zum Präsidenten machen, aber sie tun's nicht.

translation.en: How do you suppose that could happen?
Could it be because, in their hearts,
they know that he values power over people?
translation.de: dass ihm Macht mehr wert ist als Menschen?

translation.en: Disillusioned in Congress,
he authors not one single piece of legislation in two terms.
translation.de: verfasst er in zwei Amtszeiten kein einziges Gesetz.

translation.en: Can you believe that? That'll take some writing.
translation.de: So was muss gut geschrieben werden.

translation.en: Placed in nomination for president,
but it's too radical for the boys in the back.
translation.de: ist er zu radikal für die Hintermänner.

translation.en: His bid goes nowhere, but we're doing something.
translation.de: Er scheitert, aber wir erreichen etwas.

translation.en: We're building sympathy.
Rejected, he flees to lotus land,
where his faithful troll, Sancho, has prepared a mythical kingdom.
translation.de: wo sein treuer Troll Sancho ein Märchenreich vorbereitet hat.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
I forgot the love interest.
Her name… Dulcinea.
Funny, adventurous, smarter than she acts.
translation.de: Witzig, abenteuerlustig und klüger, als sie sich gibt.

translation.en: She's a showgirl,
beneath his social stratum,
but that's okay, because true love on the big screens,
translation.de: aber was soll's, wahre Liebe auf der Leinwand ist,

translation.en: we all know, is blind.
And she…
Yeah, she loves him, too.
So he takes her away to his mythical kingdom.
translation.de: Also nimmt er sie mit in sein Märchenreich.

translation.en: Can I get a bicarb?
Now, along comes nemesis.
That's Greek for any guy in a black hat.
Nemesis runs for governor, and he's a shoo-in to win.
translation.de: Nemesis kandidiert als Gouverneur und hat Aussicht, zu gewinnen.

translation.en: Why? Because he's exactly what our Don used to be.
translation.de: Warum? Weil er exakt so ist, wie unser Don früher mal war.

translation.en: An idealist, you get it?
And not only that,
nemesis is the same guy who once predicted
translation.de: Nemesis war es, der einst prophezeit hatte,

translation.en: our Quixote would one day preside over a socialist revolution.
translation.de: dass unser Quijote einmal eine sozialistische Revolution anführen würde.

translation.en: Our Quixote looks into the mirror of his youth
translation.de: Unser Quijote sieht in den Spiegel seiner Jugend

translation.en: and decides to break this glass,
a maddening reminder of who he once was.
translation.de: Die Erinnerung an den, der er mal war.

translation.en: Assisted by his faithful Sancho
and armed with all the black magic at his command,
translation.de: und all der Schwarzen Magie, die ihm zu Gebote steht,

translation.en: he does just this.
Destroying, in the process, not one man… but two.
translation.de: Wobei er nicht nur einen Mann vernichtet, sondern zwei.

translation.en: Well, what do you think, Louis?
You think it'll play?
Don't worry, folks.
The white wine came up with the fish.
translation.de: Der Weißwein kam mit dem Fisch raus.

translation.en: Who the fuck do you think you are, Mankiewicz?
translation.de: Für wen halten Sie sich, Mankiewicz?

translation.en: You're nothin' but a court jester.
And let me let you in on a little secret.
Do you have any idea who pays half your salary?
translation.de: Wer bezahlt ihr halbes Gehalt? Na?

translation.en: He pays half your fucking salary.
Him, you fucking ingrate.
You didn't know that, did ya? You wanna know why?
translation.de: Das war Ihnen neu, was? Wollen Sie wissen, warum?

translation.en: Because he likes the way you talk.
Not the way you write, the way you talk.
translation.de: Nicht, wie Sie schreiben, wie Sie reden.

translation.en: Don't that chap your ass?
Stay.
-Please, follow me. -It's very quaint.
Rise and shine, hombre.
Shoot-out at the O.K. Corral.
Before we buckle down, you have something to get off your chest?
translation.de: Bevor wir anfangen, möchten Sie was loswerden.

translation.en: As a matter of fact, I do.
Frankly, I think what I said upset you.
I know your health's not what it might be, and that comes first.
-Really? -This studio fuss, this lawsuit.
God knows what pressure's yet to come.
At your age, you'd be justified in wanting out.
translation.de: In Ihrem Alter ist das zu viel.

translation.en: I'm 43, but that's very understanding.
Mayer's buyout was rejected,
so the fat's only starting to hit the fire.
Now, I talked to RKO, and I'll tell you what they're ready to do.
translation.de: Ich habe mit RKO gesprochen. Sie wären hierzu bereit:

translation.en: In recognition of the outstanding work you've done so far,
they're prepared to relieve you of the rewrite and still honor your full pay…
translation.de: entbindet man Sie bei vollem Honorar von der Überarbeitung.

translation.en: How's that?
That's more than generous.
But I don't intend to walk.
All right.
What's bothering you, then?
You're not going to like this, Orson.
I want credit.
Come again?
It's the best thing I've ever written.
Jack, get me some Cuban cigars.
-In Victorville? -Do what you can, Jack.
Stay, Houseman. You'll miss the third act complicator.
translation.de: Du verpasst die Verwicklung im 3. Akt.

translation.en: Get going, Jack. Muy pronto.
I believe that means right away.
What I said was more in sorrow than in anger, Willie.
translation.de: Aus mir sprach mehr die Trauer als die Wut.

translation.en: Are you familiar with the parable of the organ grinder's monkey?
translation.de: Kennen Sie die Parabel vom Affen des Orgelspielers?

translation.en: Now, the organ grinder's monkey is tiny in stature,
translation.de: Sein Affe ist von winziger Statur.

translation.en: and having been taken from the wild,
he's naturally overwhelmed by the enormous world around him.
translation.de: ist er von der Welt, die ihn umgibt, überwältigt.

translation.en: But every morning, a sweet elderly woman dresses him in a fine suit of clothes.
translation.de: Aber jeden Morgen zieht ihm eine nette Dame einen feinen Anzug an.

translation.en: She fits him with a red velvet vest adorned with pearl buttons
and a handsome red fez with a silk tassel.
translation.de: ein hübscher roter Fez mit silberner Quaste.

translation.en: She slips on brocade shoes that curl at the toe.
translation.de: Sie steckt ihm Schnabelschuhe an die Füßchen.

translation.en: And he's paired with a fine gilt music box on an exquisite gold chain
translation.de: Eine zierliche Goldkette verbindet ihn mit einer Musikkiste.

translation.en: fastened to his neck and his neck alone.
translation.de: Sie ist nur an seinem Hals befestigt.

translation.en: Whenever he ventures into the city to perform, he thinks,
translation.de: Führt man ihn zum Auftritt in die Stadt, denkt er: "Ich muss sehr mächtig sein.

translation.en: "What a powerful fellow I must be."
translation.de: denkt er: "Ich muss sehr mächtig sein.

translation.en: "Look how patiently everyone waits just to watch me dance."
translation.de: Alle warten darauf, um mich tanzen zu sehen."

translation.en: Willie--
"And wherever I go," he thinks,
"this music box must follow, and with it, this poor downtrodden man."
translation.de: muss diese Musikkiste mir folgen und mit ihr dieser unterdrückte Mann.

translation.en: "And if I chose not to dance, this sorry street peddler would starve,
translation.de: Würde ich nicht tanzen, müsste der arme Hausierer hungern.

translation.en: and every time I do decide to dance, every time…
translation.de: Und jedes Mal, wenn ich beschließe zu tanzen,

translation.en: he must play."
"Whether he wishes to or not."
You've had a bit too much to drink, Herman.
translation.de: Sie hatten ein Glas zu viel.

translation.en: I'll get Raymond to drive you to the station.
Goodbye.
Put aside gratitude, Mank.
That you've done your best work was no accident.
translation.de: Sie waren nicht zufällig so gut.

translation.en: I removed any distraction, eliminated every excuse,
your family, your cronies, liquor.
I gave you a second chance.
And for that, I cannot thank you enough.
But with credit for a risky undertaking must go the weight of real responsibility.
translation.de: Wer genannt wird, ist auch voll verantwortlich.

translation.en: Given your health, I wonder if you're up to it.
And frankly, I wonder too, but we'll find out.
You may never work in this town again, Mank!
translation.de: Das könnte Ihr Ende in dieser Stadt sein!

translation.en: Orson, please…
Then you force me to remind you!
We have a contract that you understood and agreed to.
If you fight this, it will go to what your new guild calls arbitration,
translation.de: Fechten Sie ihn vor dem Schiedsgericht an!

translation.en: and you, my friend, will lose script, money,
translation.de: Sie verlieren das Skript, das Geld,

translation.en: and, assuming such a thing still exists in Hollywood,
translation.de: und, falls es das noch gibt,

translation.en: the respect of those who honor their word.
How can I put this nicely?
translation.de: Wie drücke ich das nett aus?

translation.en: I may be a loose cannon,
but you, my friend, are an outsider.
They're exasperated by me, and I've earned it,
translation.de: Von mir sind alle genervt, zu Recht.

translation.en: but you, a self-anointed savior-hyphenate,
translation.de: Sie sind ein selbst ernannter Super-Heiland.

translation.en: they're just waiting to loathe you.
translation.de: Die warten nur darauf, Sie zu hassen.

translation.en: Remind me never again to work with a washed-up alcoholic!
translation.de: Nie wieder arbeite ich mit einem Säufer!

translation.en: Duly noted. Nelson Algren, please copy.
All right! No doubt you'll get your credit.
But ask yourself, "Who's producing this picture?"
"Directing it? Starring in it?"
That's what we need when Susan leaves Kane.
translation.de: Das fehlt, wenn Susan Kane verlässt.

translation.en: An act of purging violence.
Maybe.
Mank, where are you?
Mank, come quick!
He's alive!
Ian's alive!
-He fetched up on the Orkneys! -The what?
The Orkney Islands, you idiot.
Mank, are you ever serious?
Only about something funny.
And the winner of the best original screenplay is…
Herman J. Mankiewicz…
and Orson Welles for Citizen Kane.
This is the first nomination and first win for Mr. Mankiewicz and Mr. Welles.
translation.de: Für beide die erste Nominierung und der erste Oscar.

translation.en: Neither were able to attend tonight.
Accepting for both is the president of RKO Radio Pictures, Mr. George Schaefer.
translation.de: So nimmt der Präsident von RKO den Preis entgegen.

translation.en: -Excuse me, Mr. Welles. -Good morning, gentlemen.
translation.de: RIO DE JANEIRO, BRASILIEN - 1942 "ALLES IST WAHR"-RADIO-PRESSEKONFERENZ -Guten Morgen. -Guten Morgen, Mr Welles.

translation.en: Morning, Mr. Welles. You missed a big night.
translation.de: -Guten Morgen. -Guten Morgen, Mr Welles. Sie haben was verpasst.

translation.en: Well, I was unable to attend the Academy Awards
because I'm here in Rio making a marvelous motion picture.
translation.de: da ich hier in Rio einen großartigen Film drehe.

translation.en: Kane was nominated in nine categories, including best actor.
translation.de: Kane war in neun Kategorien nominiert.

translation.en: Aren't you disappointed that it only won one Oscar?
translation.de: Sind Sie enttäuscht, dass er nur einen Oscar gewann?

translation.en: Well, that, my good man, is Hollywood.
translation.de: Das, mein guter Mann, ist Hollywood.

translation.en: Anything you'd like to say to your coauthor, Mr. Mankiewicz?
translation.de: Möchten Sie Mr Mankiewicz etwas ausrichten?

translation.en: I do have a brief message.
You may tell him from me…
"Mank, you can kiss my half!"
You ask me what my acceptance speech might have been.
translation.de: Sie fragen, wie meine Dankesrede gelautet hätte?

translation.en: Well, here goes.
I am very happy to accept this award
translation.de: Ich bin froh, diesen Preis auf die Art entgegenzunehmen,

translation.en: in the manner in which the screenplay was written,
translation.de: auf die auch das Drehbuch geschrieben wurde.

translation.en: which is to say, in the absence of Orson Welles.
translation.de: Nämlich in Abwesenheit von Orson Welles.

translation.en: How's that?
How come he shares credit?
Well, that, my friend, is the magic of the movies.
translation.de: Das, mein Freund, ist die Magie des Films.

translation.en: Hold up the Oscar, Mank. Big smile.
translation.de: Halten Sie den Oscar hoch. Lächeln.
